## Installation

You can install the development version of molevolvR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# Install Bioconductor
if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install(version = "3.19")

# Install Development Version of molevolvR
BiocManager::install("JRaviLab/molevol_scripts", ref = "begin-package-setup", subdir = "package/MolEvolvR", auth_token = '<PersonalAccessToken>')
```
